dialogues.line: Home sweet home! I am the original space station for humanity since forever.
Hot days, freezing nights - talk about weird. Each spin takes 59 Earth days... I seriously need sleep. Coffee, please?
I am dry, cold and still more hospitable than Twitter!
Feel free to try my atmosphere if you think your office is a sauna!
I am the king of the giants and a majestic beacon dancing in cosmic winds!
No planet has better rings than me!
I quietly roll through space - cold, tilted and too far to care what anyone thinks.
I am blue and mysterious! I am so far away, even Pluto keeps refusing to call me!
Though small, my existence is authentic. I stand apart with a refined sensibility, unlike those who mask their solitude with bluster.

scene: Edge of the solar system, in cosmic silence.

dialogues.line: I am the endless blue, the eternal storm, the cold mystery no one can penetrate.
Wow. Did you rehearse that poem, or did it come to you while staring into Saturn’s rings too long?
You can’t possibly understand... I am the silence between stars. I am...
You're lonely. And no one’s calling. Not even me.
I thought at least you... there was a connection between us.
Between us? The only connection is that we’re both far away. The difference is, I’ve got style. You just suffer in silence and throw storms to get noticed.
So... you won’t reach out anymore?
If your silence is a mystery, mine is a statement. Bye, blue storm.

scene: The outer region of the solar system. Pluto and Neptune are still talking.

dialogues.line: Wow, what a space soap opera. At least I’ve got rings—something that sparkles without the drama.
Please, just wrap it up already. This drama is melting my atmosphere.
Pluto, you’ve gone too far. Not that you're not used to that.
What can I say, I handle marginalization better than you handle gravity. And at least I don’t give lectures nobody asked for.
I don’t even have an atmosphere, but I heard everything!
Guys, maybe try a bit of cosmic respect. We’re still a family.
Truth is, Pluto’s small but sharp. And Neptune... maybe ease up on the wind, you’re blowing it all back.
You don’t understand. I’m the hidden ocean, the breath of the abyss, the echo of unspoken thoughts...
No, you're just that guy pretending not to care... while secretly waiting for a call. Spoiler: not calling.
Everyone laughs in the background. Mercury giggles, Saturn cracks a new joke about 'cosmic engagement rings' and Mars takes notes for an interplanetary podcast called 'Orbital Confessions.'
